title: Turnover!
description: Josh Cribbs has muffed the punt and that the Pats have it!

title: Touchdown overturned!
description: It’s overturned because Blunt was down before crossing the plane

title: Touchdown!
description: This time there is no doubt - Blunt is in the endzone and the Pats make the most of the untimely muff by Cribbs

title: Missed field goal!
description: Former Pats kicker Adam Vinatieri is wide right on the 51-yard attempt and the Colts come up empty!

title: Touchdown!
description: Brady hits James Develin at the goal line for the first touchdown of his career

title: Interception!
description: linebacker DQwell Jackson gets in front of a ball that was heading for Rob Gronkowski at the goal line!

title: Touchdown!
description: Luck gets the snap and hands off to Zurlon Tipton who runs it into the endzone!

title: Field goal!
description: 15 plays that cover 65 yards - a drive that ends with a 21-yard chip shot by kicker Stephen Gostowski.

title: Touchdown!
description: Brady throwing now and he hits who? 320lb Tackle Nate Solder! He is eligible and he is IN THE ENDZONE!

title: Touchdown!
description: Gronk streaks towards the middle of the field and is hit in the chest by Tom Brady for a touchdown!

title: Interception!
description: The fans are on their feet at the drenched Gillette Stadium as they enjoy watching their Patriots dismantle the Colts as they march towards a eighth Super Bowl appearance

title: Touchdown!
description: There goes Blount through the middle before DESTROYING both LaRon Landry and Vontae Davis as they try to slow him up at the goal line!

title: Touchdown!
description: Blount right down Broadway for the touchdown! The man now has three trips to the endzone to go along with 148 yards on the day!

title: Interception!
description: Jamie Collins steps in front of Tipton and snatches the ball away - its another pick for the Pats

title: Full-time!
description: The New England Patriots are heading to Arizona for Super Bowl XLIX
